Articles.Content: I just noticed something in Career mode. The 2 fairing bases for 3.75 or so meter and the 5 meter bases are missing in career mode...
okay, so, no one else who uses the Procedural Fairings mod has noticed these two missing bits from career mode? Guess mine bugged out or something....

The author didn't put the last two in tech tree because there are no stock parts for 3.75 and 5m

Updated to 2.4.2, mostly for tech tree support:

- Zero-radius payload is now used when no payload attached, so fairings will always reshape.

- Added parts to the tech tree (except 3 and 5m parts).

- Moved fuselage shrouds to Structural tab.

- Changing adapter attachment node size with radius.

see: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-22-Procedural-Fairings-2-4-2-tech-tree-and-minor-improvements-%28Oct-19%29?p=712589&viewfull=1#post712589
Derp on me, managed to miss that when i read it lol thx
